{"step_by_step_thinking": "The documents mention that cementum can repair itself to a limited degree, but not regenerate. However, some documents also mention that certain biological factors and treatments can lead to the regeneration of cementum. Document [29] specifically mentions that regeneration occurred in parts of the roots only if some original cementum remained on the root surface after root planing. The new cementum formed was a cellular mixed fiber cementum. Therefore, the answer should be Cellular mixed cementum.", "answer_choice": "A"}
